entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -20.0°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 0.4 km

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 01:27 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 01:27 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 01:27 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
